name: needlecord
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of thin corduroy (= a cotton material with soft raised parallel lines), with the lines very thin and close together: For autumn, how about a jacket in fine needlecord? The girls were wearing needlecord flares.
kumacore/Moment/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesThis thicker cord will wear better than the needlecord.He considered a denim shirt or even one in needlecord. Her sister put on an old needlecord pinafore.I envied her pale pink needlecord pedalpushers and a bright white T-shirt.
